articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Contributors to Successful Test-fire of SLBM
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Contributors to Successful Test-fire of SLBM
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, had a photo session with the members who contributed to the successful underwater test-fire of strategic submarine ballistic missile.
					When he appeared at the photographing venue, stormy cheers "hurrah!" burst forth.
					
					The participants warmly welcomed him, extending great thanks to him who gave credit to them for the successful test fire though he visited the test-fire ground more than ten times for the discussion on the issue of manufacturing the Korean-style powerful strategic submarine and ballistic missile and made total dedication and pathetically sincere efforts for doing so.
					
					He extended warm salute to the enthusiastically cheering participants.
					
					He warmly congratulated the scientists, technicians, workers and officials in the field of national defense and had a photo session with them.
					
					He expressed belief that the participants would fulfill their mission and duty in consolidating the arsenal of Songun revolution and turning the DPRK into a matchless military power, rocket power by giving full play to their indefatigable mental power and tremendous might. 
					
					Present there were Ri Man Gon, Ri Pyong Chol and No Kwang Chol.

articles.title: FM Spokesman Slashes at U.S. Persistent Sanctions against DPRK
articles.content:
FM Spokesman Slashes at U.S. Persistent Sanctions against DPRK
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA Thursday as regards the U.S. persistent sanctions and pressure on the DPRK:
					 A deputy assistant of the National Security Council of the White House in a press conference on August 29 took issue with the DPRK over its just measure for bolstering nuclear deterrence including the test-fire of SLBM, claiming that sanctions would be applied to the DPRK and it is necessary to put stronger pressure on it.
					
					 The U.S. seems to regard sanctions and pressure as "cure-all", an indication of its ignorance.
					
					 The DPRK has ranked itself among nuclear powers despite unprecedented harsh sanctions for decades as it has consistently embodied the spirit of self-reliance and self-development from A to Z.
					
					 Denuclearization touted by the high-ranking official of the White House proves that the U.S. has not yet woke up.
					
					 The DPRK's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts is not a stop-gap measure to cope with the rapidly changing situation but a strategic line to be constantly held fast to as long as the imperialists persist in nuclear threat and arbitrary practices. The DPRK will never step back.
					
					 Now is the time for the U.S. to clearly understand the strategic position of the DPRK and act and speak prudently.
					
					 If the U.S. acts rashly, crying out for "sanctions", it would entail more miserable consequences.

articles.title: Greetings to Slovak FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Slovak FM
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a congratulatory message to Miroslav Lajcak, minister of Foreign Affairs and Relations with Europe of Slovakia, on Thursday on its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that exchange and cooperation between the two foreign ministries for the development of bilateral relations would grow strong and wished him success in his work.

articles.title: Vietnamese Embassy Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Vietnamese Embassy Hosts Reception
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- The Vietnamese Embassy here hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Thursday on the 71st founding anniversary of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.
					 Present at the reception on invitation were Ri Kil Song, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Pak Kyong Il, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as chairman of the Korea-Vietnam Friendship Association, officials concerned, diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies here.
					
					 On hand there were Pham Huu Giao, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Vietnamese embassy, and embassy officials.

articles.title: Diplomatic Envoys, Representatives of Int'l Bodies Visit Pyongyang Orphans' Secondary School
articles.content:
Diplomatic Envoys, Representatives of Int'l Bodies Visit Pyongyang Orphans' Secondary School
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies here Thursday visited Pyongyang Orphans' Secondary School on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The guests looked round classrooms, laboratories, gymnasium and dormitory.
					
					 They also went round the Munsu Rehabilitation Clinic.

articles.title: Italian Delegation Tours Various Parts of Pyongyang
articles.content:
Italian Delegation Tours Various Parts of Pyongyang
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- A delegation of lawmakers from various political parties of Italy headed by Antonio Razzi, secretary general of the Commission for Foreign Affairs of the Senate of Italy, toured the Sci-Tech Complex.
					 The guests paid tribute to the painting depicting President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at its lobby.
					
					 They went round the hall for a scientific conference, hall of the children's dream and others.
					
					 They also visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, Nature Museum, Central Zoo, etc.

articles.title: Secretary General of International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies Leaves
articles.content:
Secretary General of International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies Leaves
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Sy El Hadji Amadou Gueye, secretary general of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies, and his party left here Thursday.

articles.title: Spokesman for C.C., Journalists Union Hits back at S. Korean Conservative Media's False Propaganda against DPRK
articles.content:
Spokesman for C.C., Journalists Union Hits back at S. Korean Conservative Media's False Propaganda against DPRK
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central  Committee of the Journalists Union of Korea released a statement on Thursday denouncing the Park Geun Hye regime of south Korea for letting its conservative media stage a mad-cap false propaganda against the 200-day campaign of loyalty underway in the DPRK.
					 Recalling that Chosun Ilbo, Choongang Ilbo, Yonhap News, News 1, Daily NK and other south Korean conservative media are running the whole gamut of false propaganda to play down the eye-opening successes made in the 200-day campaign in the DPRK, the statement termed it another hideous politically-motivated provocation against the DPRK and an unpardonable insult to its service personnel and people all out in the campaign.
					
					 Noting media should become pioneers steering the trend of the times and speaking for justice and truth, the statement goes on:
					
					 All media of the Korean nation suffering the tragedy resulting from territorial division should contribute to repairing the north-south ties, promoting national reconciliation and unity and creating an atmosphere favorable for peace and the reunification of the country.
					
					 As facts show, the die-hard conservative media of the puppet regime are making no scruple of spouting a litany of provocative remarks to do harm to the compatriots in the north and stoke confrontation, playing the role of mouthpieces of the old witch of Chongwadae. These disgusting behaviors only shed light on their true colors as pseudo group and group of hack writers that serve Park Geun Hye, the target of hatred and deadly blows. 
					
					 Now the north-south ties have been put at the lowest ebb and the distrust and hostility between the compatriots reached an extreme pitch. The conservative media of south Korea are also responsible for this situation as they have danced to the tune of the confrontation maniac of Chongwadae.
					
					 The false propaganda of the conservative media is no more than a ridiculous farce orchestrated by the puppet regime, exasperated by the eye-opening reality in the DPRK that has brought about world-startling miracles and innovations.
					
					 But with no sophism can the conservative media of south Korea hold in check the dynamic advance being made by the single-mindedly united service personnel and people of the DPRK for building a socialist power.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK will never pardon the thrice-cursed crime of the conservative media, groups of heinous hack writers and traitors, but will make them pay dearly for it when the north-south relations are repaired and the cooperation between media in the north and the south becomes brisk.
					
					 The media persons of conscience in south Korea should deal telling blows at the Park regime and its reptile ultra-right conservative media driving the north-south ties into an irretrievable catastrophe by energetically wielding their pens of justice and truth, and more dynamically turn out in the struggle for the sacred and patriotic cause of national concord and reunification.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Enforcement of "Law on Human Rights in North" Slammed
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Enforcement of "Law on Human Rights in North" Slammed
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group of traitors in south Korea are claiming that they would formally enforce the "Law on Human Rights in North" from September 4 in the wake of its fabrication at the puppet National Assembly in March despite the unanimous denunciation and opposition at home and abroad.
					 A spokesman for the DPRK Measure Council for Human Rights in South Korea in a statement on Thursday bitterly denounced it as the last-ditch effort of despicable maniacs keen on escalating confrontation with the compatriots in the north who are driven into a cliff of ruin.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The puppet group are seeking to tarnish the image of the DPRK and bring down its social system through such poor "human rights" racket. This is a ridiculous and futile act just like trying to sweep the sea with a broom.
					
					 It is nonsensical and impertinent for the Park group to talk about someone's "human rights issue" though they are made up of heinous human rights abusers resorting to fascist dictatorship and unpopular rule.
					
					 Their foolish act will touch off bigger accusation and ridicules.
					
					 The Park group had better stop acting rashly, clearly knowing where they stand.
					
					 We will have to make the Park group pay a dear price for its treacherous crime against human rights and focus on the time to settle accounts with them finally.
					
					 The projected enforcement of the "Law on Human Rights in North" will precipitate the ruin of traitor Park, the kingpin of human rights abuses, dregs of the puppet Ministry of Unification serving her and other dirty scum.

articles.title: Letter of DPRK Filing Suit against U.S-S. Korea Joint Military Drill Distributed as UNSC Official Document
articles.content:
Letter of DPRK Filing Suit against U.S-S. Korea Joint Military Drill Distributed as UNSC Official Document
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- The permanent representative of the DPRK at the UN sent a letter to the UNSC, filing a suit against the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises. The letter was distributed as UN Security Council's official document A/70/1025-S/2016/734 on Aug. 30.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
Ryongrim, September 1 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to centenarian Jon Kwi Bok residing in Ryongrim County, Jagang Province.
					 She was born as a daughter of a farm servant under the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule. She experienced bitter sorrow as a member of the stateless nation, working as a babysitter at a landowner's house and as a fire-field peasant.
					
					 It was not until President Kim Il Sung liberated the country that she could lead a worthwhile life as the mistress of the country.
					
					 She leads an optimistic life, keeping herself busy and having a balanced diet. In particular she likes bean paste.

articles.title: Contests of Loudspeaker Agitators and Art Squads Start
articles.content:
Contests of Loudspeaker Agitators and Art Squads Start
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Contests of agitators of loudspeaker vans and art squads started at the construction site of Ryomyong Street.
					 The contests brought together at least 50 announcers and 13 art squads selected from the contests among the ministries and national institutions and provinces.
					
					 O Yong Chol, vice-minister of Culture, made an opening address on Thursday.
					
					 The first-day contest was held.

articles.title: Radically Changed Central Zoo in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Radically Changed Central Zoo in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of visitors is now flowing to the Central Zoo in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, which has been recently rebuilt on a world's level.
					 At least 740 species of animals, including 260 species of gift animals, have settled in 40-odd animal sheds in the zoo.
					
					 The zoo, built on the principle of visual effect and good formative art, covers an area of 100 hectares.
					
					 Visitors can easily know what kinds of animal sheds they are even from a distance.
					
					 On either side of the zoo entrance are sci-tech room, e-library, exhibition room and other buildings.
					
					 An aquarium was built on an expansion basis three times larger than the previous one.
					
					 What catches one's eye in the zoo are the sheds of wild beasts and penguin.
					
					 The penguin shed is redolent of an iceberg.
					
					 Visitors can also see animals displaying their skills.
					
					 In the zoo they can ride in battery-powered cars and carriages decorated with flowers. And various restaurants are arranged there to promote convenience of visitors.
					
					 The Central Zoo is one of the edifices provided under the Workers' Party of Korea's policy of love for the people.

articles.title: Fruit Production Goes Up in DPRK
articles.content:
Fruit Production Goes Up in DPRK
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Signal achievements have been made in pomiculture of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 In particular, the country's Ryongjon Fruit Farm carried out its early-ripening fruits production quota more than 300 percent.
					
					 It built a pig farm with capacity of tens of tons to establish a cyclic production system of animal husbandry and fruit farming as well as an agrochemical production base with its own efforts.
					
					 The fruit production is also going up at Taedonggang and Kosan combined fruit farms, Sariwon Fruit Farm and other fruit farms, according to Kim Chol Ho, department director of the Ministry of Agriculture.
					
					 In recent years, more than 1 000 hectares of dwarf apple trees were created throughout the country every year. The first half of the year alone witnessed the appearance of over 3 000 hectares of new orchards.
					
					 Meanwhile, 160 good fruit species were introduced and a solid foundation laid to supply millions of fruit saplings to various orchards per year.

articles.title: KCNA Releases Detailed Report on How 9th Congress of Youth League Was Greeted as Great Festival of Youth Power
articles.content:
KCNA Releases Detailed Report on How 9th Congress of Youth League Was Greeted as Great Festival of Youth Power
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- KCNA released a detailed report Wednesday on the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League successfully held as a great festival of the Paektusan youth power.
					 According to the report, the congress, at which the youth league was renamed the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League and an undying great programme for ushering in the greatest heyday of the Juche-oriented youth movement was set forth, was a grand meaningful assembly for the members of the young vanguard as it marked a historic landmark in modeling the entire youth league on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The report goes on:
					
					 The hot blooded young people remaining boundlessly loyal to the Party's cause have successfully carried out the tasks given by the Party, creating world-startling legendary tales about the heroic youth in all sites for building a socialist power in the spirit of the Paektusan heroic youth and on the self-development-first principle, and entered with pride the venue of the youth league congress. 
					
					 This year they created a series of tales about the heroic youth, dashing ahead like the wind along the orbit of the Korean revolution set by the Party Central Committee in the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu.
					
					 A huge contingent of young people, with their hearts burning with loyalty to the Party and the leader, took the lead in the 70-day campaign for adding brilliance to the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea as a glorious one of victors.
					
					 The members of the Paektusan heroic youth shock brigade successfully completed Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3, a proud great youth monument, in a matter of less than half a year, thus creating a new spirit and speed representing the Mallima era.
					
					 During the 200-day campaign, dozens of important construction projects were completed, 500 odd equipment and machines were named Chongnyon and more than 18 000 young people carried out their 4 years, three years, two years and yearly national economic plans.
					
					 At least 1 250 youths honored their yearly national economic plans during the youth league congress.
					
					 The youth league congress held with splendor in Pyongyang reviewed the period during which the youth league was developed into the glorious one of the leader and the Party under the guidance of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu since the 8th Congress of the League of Socialist Working Youth, and discussed the tasks to be fulfilled by the youth to do their honorable bit as reserves, advance force and wing of the Party in the struggle for accomplishing the socialist cause of Juche.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un declared at the congress that the youth power of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il was built thanks to the original idea of the Party and the leader on prioritizing the youth and their wise leadership, and provided the important guidelines for developing the youth movement onto a fresh high level as required by modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 When the members of the young vanguard were overflowing with great pleasure and joy of having their league renamed after President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, colorful events were held to celebrate the congress.
					
					 The congress and events strikingly demonstrated the unshakable faith and will of the 5 million young vanguard members to usher in the greatest heyday of the Korean youth movement, demonstrating the dignity of the Paektusan youth power under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, holding aloft the banner of great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, and the spirit of the single-mindedly united Korean youths who formed tens of thousands-fold fortresses around the Party Central Committee.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Lashes out at S. Korean Regime's False Propaganda against DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Lashes out at S. Korean Regime's False Propaganda against DPRK
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Recently, the south Korean regime is noisily trumpeting about "the north's possible terrorism."
					 The regime staged such farce as "advising its overseas citizens to remain exceptionally careful about their safety" on Aug. 22 over "threat of the north's provocation." The next day, it staged an "anti-terror combined drill involving civilians, service personnel and police," billing "the north's possible terrorism against south Koreans."
					
					 They are just premeditated and intentional conspiratorial farces sponsored by hideous chief culprits of terrorism and tricksters involved in terrorism.
					
					 Traitor Park Geun Hye of south Korea, at "state council meetings" in June and July, cried out for "coping with imminent north's terrorist acts", talking about "north's attempt at abduction and terrorism."
					
					 Its puppet prime minister also agitated measures, asserting there is high likelihood that the north might abduct south Koreans overseas or commit terrorism by hiring an international terrorist group.
					
					 What the puppet group uttered is nothing but a base conspiratorial racket to tarnish the image of the DPRK making a big stride forward in the drive for building a socialist power despite any sanctions and pressure and to cover up their abduction and terrorism against DPRK citizens.
					
					 The eye-opening reality in the DPRK winning one victory after another despite the enemy's blockade clearly proves the injustice and inevitable bankruptcy of the puppet regime's policy of confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The international community's strong protest and denunciation against the Park regime's abduction of DPRK women citizens in broad daylight are driving into a tight corner the regime forsaken by the public. 
					
					 "The north's possible terrorism" touted by the puppet forces is the last-ditch bid to prolong their remaining days.
					
					 The Park regime is a terrorist group without an equal as it is engrossed in such crimes against the nation and ethics as perpetrating undisguised white terrorism and politically-motivated terrorism against south Koreans calling for democracy and reunification and abducting citizens of the DPRK in broad daylight before taking them to south Korea.
					
					 A series of hacking cases including the paralysis of the computer network of the agricultural cooperative bank in south Korea cited by the puppet regime as "the north's cyber terrorism" turned out to be fabrications. They bring into bolder relief the absurdity of its trumpeting about "the north's terrorism."
					
					 With no false propaganda can the Park regime justify its treacherous confrontational racket and hide its true colors as a terrorist group.
					
					 Such poor farces would only precipitate its destruction.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Reveals Aggressive Nature of Ulji Freedom Guardian
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Reveals Aggressive Nature of Ulji Freedom Guardian
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun on Thursday in an article reveals the aggressive nature of the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills.
					 Ulji Freedom Guardian kicked off on Aug. 22 is a revelation of a sinister intention to realize the wild ambition for "bringing down the social system" in the DPRK by launching a nuclear war against it at any cost, the article says, and continues:
					
					 It is the invariable scenario of the U.S. and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors to lead their military pressure on the DPRK to an adventurous preemptive nuclear strike upon it.
					
					 The ongoing saber-rattling assumes increasing danger as it is being staged pursuant to OPLAN 5015.
					
					 OPLAN 5015 is a vicious war scenario for invading the DPRK in terms of its objective, means involved and ways of carrying it out.
					
					 The main purpose of the military exercises is to make the U.S. imperialist aggressors and units of the puppet forces of south Korea get familiar with and round off procedures of phased operations and their mobile capabilities for surprise attacks on the core facilities and strategic bases of the DPRK, pursuant to OPLAN 5015.
					
					 All these facts go to prove that the war hysteria of the U.S. imperialists and the Park group to "bring down the social system" through preemptive nuclear attack upon the DPRK has reached an extreme phase.
					
					 Right to preemptive nuclear attack is not a monopoly of the U.S. and the U.S. and the Park regime had better stop their rash acts.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts Park Geun Hye Regime's Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts Park Geun Hye Regime's Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye talked such nonsense as "the north's cyber terrorism" and "possible provocation of different forms" at the recent meeting of "Ulji National Security Council".
					 Mandarins of the puppet Ministry of Unification were also busy taking necessary precautions to cope with "terrorism and abduction by the north" and providing information to media.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Thursday says:
					
					 This is nothing but a smear campaign to play down the remarkably increased position of the DPRK and stir up the atmosphere of confrontation with it in south Korea.
					
					 "Preparations for perpetrating terrorism with local Mafia involved" touted by the puppet regime is something which can be committed only by those who are expert at terrorism and abduction.
					
					 Even at this moment the Park Geun Hye group is leaving no means untried to force the women abductees of the DPRK to "defect" in custody after paying no heed to the strong demand of the public at home and abroad for their repatriation.
					
					 No matter how noisily such heinous abductors and terrorists trumpet about "the north's possible terrorism," no one will believe it.
					
					 When asked to provide concrete evidence proving the above-said possibility, mandarins of the above-said ministry were at their wit's end and hastily took to flight.
					
					 It is quite natural for the Park group to face such public curse and criticism.

articles.title: Papers Call for Strengthening Non-Aligned Movement
articles.content:
Papers Call for Strengthening Non-Aligned Movement
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Papers Thursday dedicate articles to the Day of the Non-Aligned Movement which call for developing the movement.
					 The first non-aligned summit was held in Belgrade, the capital city of former Yugoslavia, on Sept. 1, 1961 with delegates of 25 countries attending.
					
					 The member countries of the movement declared the day as the Day of the Non-Aligned Movement and conducted diverse work and events every year.
					
					 The DPRK became a member of the movement on Aug. 25, 1975.
					
					 The present era is the era of independence and anti-imperialist independence is the idea of the movement, says Rodong Sinmun.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 For the non-aligned countries to boost solidarity and cooperation is a source of invincible might of the movement and a decisive guarantee for the victory of the cause of independence against imperialism.
					
					 The movement has grown to be the one having more than a hundred of member countries to play an important role in the development of the world situation and the solution of international issues.
					
					 The DPRK, a dignified member of the movement, will firmly join hands with all non-aligned countries, resolutely oppose the imperialists and positively fight for peace and democracy, national independence and social progress and make all efforts to ensure that the movement creditably performs its historic mission in the future, too.
					
					 Minju Joson says that only when the non-aligned countries get united and struggle while firmly adhering to the independent stand against imperialism, can they surely realize their ideal and desire.

articles.title: S. Korean War Maniacs to Stage North-targeted Drills
articles.content:
S. Korean War Maniacs to Stage North-targeted Drills
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Warmongers of the south Korean puppet army announced that they would launch field mobile drills of the 11th army division in the areas of Hwachon, Chunchon and Hongchon of Kangwon Province of south Korea from Thursday.
					 To be involved in the drills which will end next Wednesday are huge troops and war hardware. They will reportedly stage drills for getting familiar with river crossing and maneuvers.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Slams Puppet Ministry of Defense Moving to Deploy THAAD
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Slams Puppet Ministry of Defense Moving to Deploy THAAD
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea held the 172nd  meeting of peace and disarmament before the puppet Ministry of Defense on Aug. 30 denouncing the military group for making desperate efforts to deploy THAAD. 
					 Speakers said that the ministry set the Songju golf links, Mt. Yomsokpong in Kumsu-myon and Mt. Kkachi in Surun-myon as the third place for THAAD deployment and investigated them on the spot.
					
					 They noted that SM-3 missile to be deployed by the ministry in the wake of THAAD is not related to defense of south Korea and, therefore, its introduction should be stopped at once.

articles.title: Epidemics Spread in S. Korea
articles.content:
Epidemics Spread in S. Korea
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Various kinds of epidemics occurred in south Korea one after another, according to south Korean MBC and KBS.
					More than 200 people infected with hepatitis C were reported from Sunchang, North Jolla Province.
					
					On Aug. 30, a man in his fifties in Kwangju was confirmed to be infected with Japanese encephalitis.

articles.title: Actions for Forcing Japan to Redress Japanese Imperialists' Labor Conscription of Koreans Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions for Forcing Japan to Redress Japanese Imperialists' Labor Conscription of Koreans Staged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Labor movement organizations of south Korea are conducting dynamic actions to force Japan to redress the labor conscription of Koreans by the Japanese imperialists, according to Tongil News, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 South Korean workers planned to set up a worker statue condemning the labor conscription of Koreans by the Japanese imperialists in Japan before any other places of the world from three years ago and have conducted activities to implement it.
					
					 On August 24 a worker statue was erected near a pit of the manganese mine in an area of Kyoto, Japan where many Koreans were forced to do slave labor under the Japanese imperialists' rule over Korea.
					
					 That day, members of delegations of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) and the Federation of Trade Unions of south Korea (FTUK) held a meeting before the statue together with the creators of the statue and compatriots in Japan.
					
					 At the meeting speakers said that many Koreans were taken to Japan and forced to do slave labor like beasts of burden and met miserable deaths and after the liberation of Korea, too, they could not return home due to the country's division, subject to all sorts of discrimination and suppression.
					
					 They called for putting an end to the history of division.
					
					 They expressed the will to make a new history of peace and reunification of the country together with more workers.
					
					 Earlier, the KCTU and FTUK attended a meeting for remembering the victims of the explosion of ship Ukishima-maru.

articles.title: United Actions of Trade Unions Called for in South Korea
articles.content:
United Actions of Trade Unions Called for in South Korea
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Trade unions of south Korea held a seminar in Seoul on Aug. 30 under the sponsorship of the Jon Thae Il Foundation and called for the unity of the working circle, according to the south Korean internet paper Tongil News.
					 Stressing the need for the workers to get united, the speakers said that split between the Confederation of Trade Unions and the Federation of Trade Unions and between the full-time workers and the part-time workers should not be allowed.
					
					 The solidarity and unity of the labor movement is required for weathering the present crisis, they said.

articles.title: 9th Congress of Youth League Marked in DR Congo, Angola
articles.content:
9th Congress of Youth League Marked in DR Congo, Angola
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in DR Congo and round-table talks in Angola to mark the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League on August 24 and 25.
					 The deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of DR Congo and other speakers said that the Korean youth fully discharged their responsibility and role in building a socialist power as the young vanguard following the Songun leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. He extended warm congratulations to the Korean youth on the 9th Congress of the youth league.
					
					 A construction inspector in Cabinda Province of Angola and other speakers said that how to solve the youth problem is a very important problem for the destiny of the country and nation as the history shows, adding that it is the only DPRK that perfectly solved the problem as it is led by the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 The Korean youth have been trained as brave fighters in accomplishing the cause of the Juche revolution and they are creating miracles and innovations on all fronts of building a socialist power.
					
					 The congress will be the one of single-hearted unity and glory for the Korean youth.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting held in DR Congo.

articles.title: Ulji Freedom Guardian Joint Military Drill Denounced by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Ulji Freedom Guardian Joint Military Drill Denounced by Swiss Organizations
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on August 23 in denunciation of the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drill kicked off by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime.
					 The statement said that the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet regime have started the joint military drill at last. It went on:
					
					 Socialist Korea solemnly warned that it was fully ready to destroy the stronghold for provocation with a treasured sword of Songun if the enemies attack it once again.
					
					 The U.S. and Park Geun Hye, the pro-U.S. traitor, should not remain indifferent to the warning.
					
					 We fully support all the countermeasures taken by the DPRK for smashing the U.S. nuclear war moves.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Feats Lauded by Russian Websites
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Feats Lauded by Russian Websites
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Russian websites posted special write-ups on the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The internet newspaper Zebri Deve of Khabarovsk Territory posted an article titled "By dint of Songun" on August 22, illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The article said that the DPRK has firmly defended its sovereignty and dignity in the standoff with the U.S. styling itself the "only superpower" in the world for more than a half century since Kim Jong Il provided his first field guidance for his Songun revolutionary leadership to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The internet homepage Klasobaya Boriva posted an article titled "Day of Songun Marked in DPRK" on August 25, accompanied by his photo.
					
					 It noted that in the days of his Songun leadership he trained the Korean People's Army into an invincible army and consolidated the military capability of the country in every way with the KPA as a core, providing a firm military guarantee for the victory of the socialist cause.
					
					 The internet news Primorski Reporzor praised his Songun leadership exploits on August 26.

articles.title: DPRK's Day of Songun Marked by German, French Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK's Day of Songun Marked by German, French Organizations
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- German and French organizations posted special write-ups on websites on the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The German Group for the Study of Korean Culture posted an article titled "Comrade Kim Jong Il, eternal sun of Songun" illustrated with his photo on the website of the MS Travel Company of Germany on Aug. 23.
					
					 The article said that Kim Jong Il defended and advanced the cause of socialism with his original Songun politics, formulated Songun politics as the main political mode under socialism by acquiring a deep insight into the requirement of the prevailing situation and the developing revolution in the closing years of the last century and energetically led the work for bolstering up the self-defensive capabilities in every way.
					
					 It stressed that it is the greatest exploit performed by him that he provided a sure guarantee for adding eternal shine to the history of the victory of Songun revolution with far-sighted wisdom.
					
					 It noted that his Songun revolutionary cause is being successfully carried forward by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The France-Korea Friendship Association posted on a website on Aug. 25 an article illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Un, lauding him for setting forth a fresh line of simultaneously developing the two fronts in the era of Songun, thereby making the DPRK fully demonstrate once again its dignity and might as an invincible nuclear weapons state.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful SLBM Test-fire Praised by British Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful SLBM Test-fire Praised by British Organizations
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- The British Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK released a joint statement on August 26, congratulating the DPRK on its success in the strategic submarine-launched ballistic missile test-fire.
					 The statement said that the test-fire was successfully conducted under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 This event was provided thanks to his Songun revolutionary leadership, it said, and went on:
					
					 There is no greater auspicious event than this test-fire that added more fresh significance to the Day of Songun of the DPRK.
					
					 The successful test-fire of the ballistic missile Pukguksong showed the validity and vitality of the DPRK's self-development-first principle.
					
					 The statement quoted Kim Jong Un as saying: "I do not guess what ridiculous remarks the U.S. and its followers will make about this test-fire, but I can say their rash acts will only precipitate their self-destruction. The best way of escaping the deadly strike of the infuriated Korean People's Army is to refrain from hurting the dignity and security of the DPRK with prudence and self-control."
					
					 We warmly congratulate the DPRK on another great success, the statement added.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibition Opens in Russia
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibition Opens in Russia
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- A Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition was opened at an art gallery in Almetsievsk City of the Republic of Tatarstan of the Russian Federation on August 23 on the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership and the 68th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were photos dealing with exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Exhibited there were their works, books dealing with their greatness and handicrafts showing the brilliant culture of the Korean people.
					
					 The vice-chairperson of the Executive Committee of the city said that the citizens would know better about the wisdom, talent and high level of culture of the Korean people through the exhibition, adding that the exhibition will make a positive contribution to the development of the friendly relations between the two countries.
					
					 Participants watched an artistic performance after the opening ceremony ended.
					
					 They watched Korean films "Mirae Scientists Street" and "Songdowon International Children's Camp".

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se fotografia junto con contribuyentes a lanzamiento de SLBM
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se fotografia junto con contribuyentes a lanzamiento de SLBM
Pyongyang, primero de septiembre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se fotografio junto a los miembros quienes contribuyeron al exitoso lanzamiento de prueba del misil balistico del submarino estrategico.
					Cuando Kim Jong Un salio al lugar de filmacion estallaron las estruendosas aclamaciones de "!Viva!"
					
					Los participantes le dieron el saludo de infinito agradecimiento al Presidente quien dedico gran abnegacion por la construccion del submarino estrategico y el misil balistico poderoso a estilo coreano visitando en mas de 10 ocasiones el lugar de lanzamiento de prueba, y ahora les presenta como protagonistas de todos los exitos.
					
					El Presidente les envio el cordial saludo a los participantes.
					
					Felicito a los cientificos, tecnicos, obreros y funcionarios de la rama de industria de defensa nacional y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que al desplegar al maximo el indoblegable poderio espiritual y la fuerza inagotable los participantes cumpliran con su mision y deber asumidos para consolidar mas firmemente el arsenal de la revolucion Songun y convertir a nuestro pais en la potencia militar y la de cohetes sin rivales.
					
					Estaban presentes Ri Man Gon, Ri Pyong Chol y No Kwang Chol.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un felicita a Jon Kwi Bok por su centesimo cumpleanos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un felicita a Jon Kwi Bok por su centesimo cumpleanos
Pyongyang, primero de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio la mesa de alimentos a Jon Kwi Bok, moradora en el distrito de Ryongrim de la provincia de Jagang, quien celebra el centesimo aniversario del nacimiento.
					Nacida bajo la dominacion colonial del imperialismo japones como hija de sirviente pobre, ella sintio profundamente la tristeza apatrida viviendo maltratada y despreciada como ninera de la casa de un terrateniente y un campesino que cultiva la tierra desbrozada con fuego.
					
					Despues de que el Presidente Kim Il Sung libero el pais, ella podia gozar de una vida verdadera y felicidad como duena del pais.
					
					La anciana, diligente en el trabajo y siempre optimista, mantiene su dieta equilibrada y le gusta mucho la pasta de soya casera.

articles.title: Portavoz de MINREX rechaza insistencia norteamericana en sanciones anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Portavoz de MINREX rechaza insistencia norteamericana en sanciones anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, primero de septiembre (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la ACNC formulada en relacion con que Estados Unidos volvio a soltar las viejas insistencias en sanciones y presion, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea respondio el dia primero como lo siguiente:
					En una entrevista sostenida el 29 de agosto, el subayudante de Seguridad Nacional de la Casa Blanca censuro las justas medidas de la RPDC por fortalecer el disuasivo nuclear, inclusive el lanzamiento de prueba del misil balistico del submarino estrategico, y peroro que ejecutara las sanciones y se necesita dar mas presiones a la RPDC.
					
					Parece que EE.UU. considera como una "receta universal" la sancion y la presion, lo cual deviene la expresion de que el no esta liberado todavia de la ignorancia.
					
					Pese a las severas sanciones sin precedentes de varios decenios, podemos tener dignamente la posicion de la potencia nuclear como hoy. Esto se debe enteramente a que hemos venido materializando invariablemente el espiritu de autofortalecimiento.
					
					El hecho de que el funcionario de alto nivel del Consejo de Seguridad Nacional de la Casa Blanca habla todavia de la desnuclearizacion demuestra que EE.UU. esta invariablemente en el sueno.
					
					Nuestra linea de desarrollo paralelo no es una contramedida para hacer frente a la situacion en brusco cambio, sino la linea estrategica que debemos mantener permanentemente mientras que siguen las amenazas y arbitrariedades nucleares de los imperialistas. No nos retiraremos jamas de este camino.
					
					Ya es el tiempo en que EE.UU. debe hacer con seriedad sus acciones y pronunciaciones viendo correctamente la posicion de la RPDC entrada en la primera fila de las potencias nucleares.
					
					Si ese pais americano no se libera de la caduca actitud y actua imprudentemente soltando de continuo sus sofisterias de "sancion", seran mas catastroficas sus consecuencias.

articles.title: Entidad norcoreana condena intento de Park Geun-hye por ejecutar "ley de DDHH de Norte"
articles.content:
Entidad norcoreana condena intento de Park Geun-hye por ejecutar "ley de DDHH de Norte"
Pyongyang, primero de septiembre (ACNC) -- A pesar de la unanime denuncia y rechazo del interior y exterior del pais, la horda traidora de Park Geun-hye invento en marzo pasado la "ley de derechos humanos del Norte" en la "Asamblea Nacional" titere y trata de ponerla en vigencia desde el 4 de septiembre.
					En su declaracion publicada hoy, el portavoz de la Sociedad Coreana de Medidas de DDHH en el Sur de Corea lo califico rotundamente de los esfuerzos desesperados de los sucios maniacos de confrontacion fraticida, y prosiguio:
					
					El intento de la banda titere de manchar la imagen de la digna RPDC y atentar su regimen mediante la campana intrigante de "DDHH", no pasa de ser la locura absurda e inutil al igual con arar en el mar.
					
					En particular, deviene el hecho extremadamente ilogico el que la camarilla de Park, connotado verdugo de DDHH que recurre invariablemente en la dictadura fascista y la mala politica antipopular, habla ruidosamente del "problema de DDHH" de alguien. 
					
					Pero, esos criminales de DDHH se atreven a cuestionar el "problema de DDHH" de alguien, lo cual causara solo la gran censura y burla de la poblacion mundial.
					
					Park y sus compinches deben actuar con prudencia al darse cuenta de su miserable situacion en agonia. 
					
					Estamos registrando con el espiritu vengativo todos los crimenes antinacionales y anti-DDHH de la camarilla traidora de Park y esperamos con ansiedad el momento de sacar la cuenta final. 
					
					La campana para la ejecucion de la "ley de DDHH del Norte" acelerara solamente el arruinamiento de la traidora Park, caudilla de violacion de DDHH, y sus sirvientes del Ministerio de Unificacion titere.

articles.title: UPC condena demagogia anti-RPDC de medios conservadores surcoreanos
articles.content:
UPC condena demagogia anti-RPDC de medios conservadores surcoreanos
Pyongyang, primero de septiembre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que los medios de prensa conservadores surcoreanos, instigados por la banda de Park Geun-hye, recurren con frenesi a la demagogia sobre la campana de 200 dias de fidelidad en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Comite Central de la Union de Periodistas de Corea hizo publica el dia primero una declaracion.
					Chosun Ilbo, Choongang Ilbo, Yonhap News, News 1, Daily NK y otros medios conservadores surcoreanos sueltan las sofisterias de toda indole para despreciar los exitos relevantes de la campana de 200 dias, lo cual deviene una brutal provocacion politica a la RPDC e insoportable insulto al ejercito y pueblo coreanos levantados en la campana de 200 dias, senala el portavoz y continua:
					
					La prensa es el conductor de la epoca y el vocero de la justicia y la verdad. 
					
					En particular, para la nacion coreana que sufre la tragedia de la division del territorio nacional los medios de prensa deben contribuir debidamente a mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas, promover la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales y preparar el ambiente favorable a la paz y la reunificacion del pais. 
					
					Pero, los medios conservadores titeres surcoreanos, siendo sirvientes de la duena diabolica de Chongwadae, divulgan las palabras provocativas y virulentas que denigran a la misma nacion y fomentan el enfrentamiento fratricida. De esta manera, mostraron por si mismos su naturaleza como grupo de seudo-periodistas venales aliados con la traidora Park Geun-hye, objeto de odio de la nacion. 
					
					Los medios conservadores, que bailan al son que le toca la maniaca de enfrentamiento Park, tambien tienen la culpabilidad de la situacion actual en que las relaciones Norte-Sur se llegaron a la peor etapa y se crearon la extrema  desconfianza y hostilidad entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					Las calumnias de los medios conservadores surcoreanos no pasan de ser los chismes ridiculos de tipejos disgustados de la realidad maravillosa de la RPDC donde los militares y civiles registran diariamente grandes saltos y milagros en la campana de 200 dias. 
					
					Los medios conservadores surcoreanos no podran impedir ni encubrir jamas con cualesquier maldiciones el gran avance de la RPDC donde todos los uniformados y civiles, unidos como un solo hombre, marchan con pasos firmes por la construccion de la potencia socialista.
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo coreanos no perdonaran jamas los archi-crimenes de los medios conservadores ultraderechistas, colectivo de escritores venales y traidores a la nacion, y saldaran sin falta la cuenta final en nombre de todos los coreanos cuando se mejoren las relaciones intercoreanas y se revitalicen las cooperaciones entre los medios de prensa.
					
					Los conscientes hombres de prensa surcoreanos deben tomar mas firmemente el pincel de la justicia y la veracidad para asestar un golpe demoledor a la camarilla de Park y sus lacayunas prensas conservadoras y ultraderechistas que llevan las relaciones intercoreanas a la fase catastrofica irremediable. Y deben levantarse con mas dinamismo en la sagrada causa patriotica por la reconciliacion y reunificacion nacionales.

articles.title: Regresan Sy El Hadji Amadou Gueye y su comitiva
articles.content:
Regresan Sy El Hadji Amadou Gueye y su comitiva
Pyongyang, primero de septiembre (ACNC) -- Partieron este jueves de esta capital el secretario general de la Federacion Internacional de Sociedades de la Cruz Roja y la Medialuna Roja, Sy El Hadji Amadou Gueye, y su comitiva.

articles.title: ACNC refuta insistencia del Sur de Corea  en "terrorismo posible del Norte"
articles.content:
ACNC refuta insistencia del Sur de Corea  en "terrorismo posible del Norte"
Pyongyang, primero de septiembre (ACNC) -- En los ultimos dias, los titeres surcoreanos hablan ruidosamente de la "posibilidad del terrorismo del Norte".
					El pasado dia 22, orquestaron una farsa de encomendar a los "moradores ultramarinos atender con cuidado especial a la seguridad personal" frente a la "amenaza de provocacion del Norte", y el dia siguiente, libraron el "entrenamiento antiterrorista combinado de civiles, funcionarios publicos, militares y policias" insistiendo en la "posibilidad de terrorismo del Norte contra el Sur". 
					
					Es una intriga premeditada de los criminales y estafadores terroristas.
					
					En los "consejos de ministros" convocados en junio y julio pasados, la traidora Park Geun-hye hablo del "intento de secuestro y terrorismo del Norte" y chismeo que "hay que tomar la disposicion teniendo en consideracion la inminencia del terrorismo del Norte". 
					
					El premier surcoreano tambien incito a buscar las medidas necesarias disparateando que "hay preocupaciones de que el Norte secuestre a los moradores surcoreanos en el extranjero o cometa el terrorismo instigando a las organizaciones terroristas internacionales". 
					
					Tales actos intrigantes persiguen el objetivo de manchar el prestigio de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que marcha con vigor por construir una potencia socialista superando la presion y sanciones de toda indole, y ocultar su crimen de secuestro a los moradores norcoreanos. 
					
					La realidad maravillosa de la RPDC que sale siempre victoriosa aun en medio del bloqueo de los enemigos testimonia la injusticia de la politica conflictiva anti-RPDC de los titeres surcoreanos y lo inevitable de su fracaso. 
					
					En particular, la fuerte protesta y repudio de la sociedad internacional sobre el crimen terrorista de la banda de Park, que secuestro a plena luz del dia a las ciudadanas de la RPDC, ponen en aprietos a los titeres marginados por la poblacion. 
					
					En tal circunstancia, los titeres surcoreanos inventaron la sofisteria de "terrorismo posible del Norte" como ultimo remedio para mantener su sucia vida restante. 
					
					La horda de Park es precisamente el grupo terrorista inaudito que comete abiertamente el terrorismo politico contra las personas aspirantes a la democracia y la reunificacion, secuestra a plena luz del dia a los moradores norcoreanos y los lleva al Sur de Corea.
					
					Los incidentes de hacking, que fueron descritos como "terrorismo cibernetico del Norte" por los titeres surcoreanos, y despues, esclarecidos como inventos de estos mismos, testimonian la absurdidad de la insistencia de la camarilla de Park en el "terrorismo del Norte".
					
					La banda de Park no puede justificar de ninguna manera su politica conflictiva anti-RPDC ni ocultar su naturaleza como colectivo de criminales terroristas. 
					
					Sus intrigas inutiles adelantaran solo su fin tragico.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela caracter agresivo de simulacro conjunto EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela caracter agresivo de simulacro conjunto EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, primero de septiembre (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual publicado este jueves, el diario Rodong Sinmun revelo el caracter agresivo del simulacro conjunto EE.UU.-Sur de Corea. 
					Ulji Freedom Guardian, iniciado desde el dia 22 del mes expirado, testimonia el malsano intento de provocar a toda costa la guerra nuclear contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea para asi lograr la ilusion de "unificacion institucional". 
					
					EE.UU. y la camarilla traidora de Park Geun-hye persiguen el invariable objetivo de extender la presion militar anti-RPDC al aventurero ataque preventivo nuclear. 
					
					El presente simulacro conjunto UFG se desarrolla segun el "OPLAN 5015", guion de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC. He aqui su peligrosidad. 
					
					La meta principal de UFG es adiestrar y completar la capacidad movil y los tramites de cumplimiento de operaciones por etapas de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas y unidades militares surcoreanas para asestar el ataque sorpresivo contra los objetos medulares y las bases estrategicas de la RPDC. 
					
					La realidad demuestra claramente que llega a la intolerable fase la locura histerica de los provocadores de lograr la ambicion de "derrocamiento de regimen norcoreano" mediante el ataque preventivo nuclear. 
					
					El ataque preventivo nuclear no es el monopolio de EE.UU. 
					
					EE.UU. y la camarilla de Park deben actuar con prudencia.
